entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is remembering his past.

entities.name: staircase
entities.description: A part of Harry's home where he used to look up at it every morning.

entities.name: spider
entities.description: Insects that were often found on the staircase in Harry's past.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Harry's uncle, who is mentioned as having nearly crashed his car due to one of Harry's dreams.

relationships.description: Harry used to look up at the underside of the staircase every morning.
Spiders were often found on the staircase in Harry's past.
Uncle Vernon nearly crashed his car due to one of Harry's dreams.
